nodes.text: Mercenaries' Lament was the name of a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The master painting was part of a two-painting set which attempted to capture the despair and internal struggle in the hearts of mercenaries throughout the galaxy. This particular painting depicted a male Zabrak mercenary full of lament.
Mercenaries' Lament was a painting in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
